data.title: Charles E. Hutton Obituary 2014
data.meta_description: Charles E. Hutton, age 84, of Eaton, Ohio died Sunday, February 9, 2014 at the Greenbriar in Eaton, Ohio.  Born on August 7, 1929 in Castine, Ohio, son of the late William & Dor...
data.text:
Charles E. Hutton, age 84, of Eaton, Ohio died Sunday, February 9, 2014 at the Greenbriar in Eaton, Ohio. Born on August 7, 1929 in Castine, Ohio, son of the late William & Doris (Black) Hutton. Charles proudly served in the US Army during the Korean War. Member of the American Legion in West Manchester, OH. Charles had served on the West Manchester Council. Charles loved trap shooting, playing cards and enjoyed spending time with his family and traveling. Preceded in death by his wife, Marilyn Hutton in 2006; sister, Catherine Swihart.

Survived by daughters & sons-in-law, Pamela & Michael Brown of Eaton, OH and Becky & Don Leach of Greenville, OH; grandchildren, Sabrina Leach, Tasha & Shawn Stephan and Andy Leach; great grandchildren, Austin, Haylie, Colton and Kierra; numerous cousins, nieces, nephews and friends.

Funeral service will be held on Thursday, February 13, 2014 - 11:00 a.m. at Barnes Funeral Home, 220 E. Main St., Eaton, OH. Interment will be held in Castine Cemetery with full military honors provided by the Preble County Honor Guard. Family will receive friends on Wednesday, February 12, 2014 from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. at the funeral home. Condolences via www.barnesfuneralhome.com
